actions.name: AddPermission
actions.description: Grants permission to add a statement to a topic's access control policy, granting access for the specified AWS accounts to the specified actions

actions.name: CheckIfPhoneNumberIsOptedOut
actions.description: Grants permission to accept a phone number and indicate whether the phone holder has opted out of receiving SMS messages from your account

actions.name: ConfirmSubscription
actions.description: Grants permission to verify an endpoint owner's intent to receive messages by validating the token sent to the endpoint by an earlier Subscribe action

actions.name: CreatePlatformApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to create a platform application object for one of the supported push notification services, such as APNS and GCM, to which devices and mobile apps may register

actions.name: CreatePlatformEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to create an endpoint for a device and mobile app on one of the supported push notification services, such as GCM and APNS

actions.name: CreateSMSSandboxPhoneNumber
actions.description: Grants permission to add a destination phone number and send a one-time password (OTP) to that phone number for an AWS account

actions.name: CreateTopic
actions.description: Grants permission to create a topic to which notifications can be published

actions.name: DeleteEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to delete the endpoint for a device and mobile app from Amazon SNS

actions.name: DeletePlatformApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a platform application object for one of the supported push notification services, such as APNS and GCM

actions.name: DeleteSMSSandboxPhoneNumber
actions.description: Grants permission to delete an AWS account's verified or pending phone number

actions.name: DeleteTopic
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a topic and all its subscriptions

actions.name: GetDataProtectionPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to return the data protection policy of the topic

actions.name: GetEndpointAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the endpoint attributes for a device on one of the supported push notification services, such as GCM and APNS

actions.name: GetPlatformApplicationAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the attributes of the platform application object for the supported push notification services, such as APNS and GCM

actions.name: GetSMSAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to return the settings for sending SMS messages from your account

actions.name: GetSMSSandboxAccountStatus
actions.description: Grants permission to retrieve the sandbox status for the calling account in the target region

actions.name: GetSubscriptionAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to return all of the properties of a subscription

actions.name: GetTopicAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to return all of the properties of a topic

actions.name: ListEndpointsByPlatformApplication
actions.description: Grants permission to list the endpoints and endpoint attributes for devices in a supported push notification service, such as GCM and APNS

actions.name: ListOriginationNumbers
actions.description: Grants permission to list all origination numbers, and their metadata

actions.name: ListPhoneNumbersOptedOut
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of phone numbers that are opted out, meaning you cannot send SMS messages to them

actions.name: ListPlatformApplications
actions.description: Grants permission to list the platform application objects for the supported push notification services, such as APNS and GCM

actions.name: ListSMSSandboxPhoneNumbers
actions.description: Grants permission to list the calling account's current pending and verified destination phone numbers

actions.name: ListSubscriptions
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of the requester's subscriptions

actions.name: ListSubscriptionsByTopic
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of the subscriptions to a specific topic

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list all tags added to the specified Amazon SNS topic

actions.name: ListTopics
actions.description: Grants permission to return a list of the requester's topics

actions.name: OptInPhoneNumber
actions.description: Grants permission to opt in a phone number that is currently opted out, which enables you to resume sending SMS messages to the number

actions.name: Publish
actions.description: Grants permission to send a message to all of a topic's subscribed endpoints

actions.name: PutDataProtectionPolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to allow a topic owner to set the data protection policy

actions.name: RemovePermission
actions.description: Grants permission to remove a statement from a topic's access control policy

actions.name: SetEndpointAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to set the attributes for an endpoint for a device on one of the supported push notification services, such as GCM and APNS

actions.name: SetPlatformApplicationAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to set the attributes of the platform application object for the supported push notification services, such as APNS and GCM

actions.name: SetSMSAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to set the default settings for sending SMS messages and receiving daily SMS usage reports

actions.name: SetSubscriptionAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to allow a subscription owner to set an attribute of the topic to a new value

actions.name: SetTopicAttributes
actions.description: Grants permission to allow a topic owner to set an attribute of the topic to a new value

actions.name: Subscribe
actions.description: Grants permission to prepare to subscribe an endpoint by sending the endpoint a confirmation message

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add tags to the specified Amazon SNS topic

actions.name: Unsubscribe
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a subscription

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove tags from the specified Amazon SNS topic

actions.name: VerifySMSSandboxPhoneNumber
actions.description: Grants permission to verify a destination phone number with a one-time password (OTP) for an AWS account
